title: x/tools/cmd/godoc: improve recursive Internal call graph presentation
body: What version of Go are you using (go version)? N/A (go 1.5, go tip), using `golang.org/x/tools` at `fe74a4186116b8d7dd38a723993e0d84f8834b34`. What operating system and processor architecture are you using? N/A (OS X 10.11.3) What did you do? Ran `godoc -http :6060 -analysis type,pointer`. What did you see instead? Running analyses on an recursive function creates a rather interesting call graph, see image below. Could there be a better way to display the call graph of recursive functions? Note: this has no priority, just creating an issue so it's not forgotten.
